grav_captain.name: Prime Gravite Captain
grav_captain.description: A fearless next-generation leader in experimental Gravite armor.

marine_zealot.name: Marine Zealot
marine_zealot.description: An armored priest who blesses their allies and smites their foes.

marine_zealot_on_bike.name: Marine Zealot on Bike

imperial_swordmaster.description: A fearless swordsman trained in hunting enemy leaders.

imperial_marine_sergeant.name: Imperial Marine Sergeant
imperial_marine_sergeant.description: Elite trained marine leader sworn to protect the Empire.

assault_marine_sergeant.name: Assault Marine Sergeant
assault_marine_sergeant.description: An elite marine leader trained to fight in close combat.

scout_marine_sergeant.name: Scout Marine Sergeant

prime_marine.description: Elite trained marine of a new breed.

prime_marine_sergeant.description: Elite trained marine leader of a new breed.

prime_infiltration_sergeant.name: Prime Infiltration Sergeant
prime_infiltration_sergeant.description: Elite trained marines of a new breed specialized in infiltration and stealth tactics.

prime_sniper_marine.name: Prime Sniper Marine
prime_sniper_marine.description: Elite trained marine with a long ranged weapon, tasked with eliminating threats.

prime_sniper_sergeant.name: Prime Sniper Sergeant
prime_sniper_sergeant.description: Elite trained marine leader with a long ranged weapon, tasked with eliminating threats.

honor_guard.description: Marine clad in golden armor and wings with dangerous melee weapons.

honor_guard_sergeant.name: Honor Guard Sergeant
honor_guard_sergeant.description: Marine leader clad in golden armor and wings with dangerous melee weapons.

strike_marine.name: Strike Marine
strike_marine.description: Elite, well-equipped marine grouped up into deadly strike teams.

strike_marine_heavy.name: Strike Marine Heavy
strike_marine_heavy.description: Elite, well-equipped marine grouped up into deadly strike teams.

strike_marine_sergeant.name: Strike Marine Sergeant
strike_marine_sergeant.description: Elite, well-equipped leader grouped up into deadly strike teams.

prime_strike_marine.description: Elite, well-equipped marine grouped up into deadly strike teams.

prime_strike_marine_heavy.description: Elite, well-equipped marine grouped up into deadly strike teams.

prime_strike_sergeant.name: Prime Strike Sergeant
prime_strike_sergeant.description: Elite, well-equipped marine leader grouped up into deadly strike teams.

werewolf.name: Werewolf
werewolf.description: A marine that is half marine and half werewolf.

werewolf_sergeant.name: Werewolf Sergeant
werewolf_sergeant.description: Marine leader that is half marine and half werewolf.

prime_grav_marine.name: Prime Gravite Marine
prime_grav_marine.description: A marine wearing experimental Gravite armor with devastating fist-weapons.

prime_grav_sergeant.name: Prime Gravite Sergeant
prime_grav_sergeant.description: Marine leader wearing experimental Gravite armor with devastating fist-weapons.

prime_biker_marine.name: Prime Biker Marine
prime_biker_marine.description: Upgraded and highly trained biker armed to the teeth.

prime_bike_sergeant.name: Prime Biker Sergeant
prime_bike_sergeant.description: Upgraded and highly trained biker leader armed to the teeth.

marine_biker.name: Marine Biker
marine_biker.description: An imperial marine on combat bike.

marine_biker_sergeant.name: Marine Biker Sergeant
marine_biker_sergeant.description: An imperial marine leader on combat bike.

scout_biker.name: Scout Biker
scout_biker.description: Scout marine on a combat bike.

scout_biker_sergeant.name: Scout Biker Sergeant
scout_biker_sergeant.description: Scout marine leader on a combat bike.

furious_marine_sergeant.name: Furious Marine Sergeant
furious_marine_sergeant.description: An especially angry assault marine leader.

destroyer.name: Destroyer
destroyer.description: Highly trained marine clad in very heavy armor.

destroyer_sergeant.name: Destroyer Sergeant
destroyer_sergeant.description: Highly trained marine leader clad in very heavy armor.

devastator.name: Devastator Marine
devastator.description: A highly trained marine armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

heavy_devastator.name: Heavy Devastator Marine
heavy_devastator.description: A highly trained marine armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

heavy_devastator_sergeant.name: Heavy Devastator Sergeant
heavy_devastator_sergeant.description: A highly trained marine leader armed to the teeth with advanced weaponry.

prime_devastator.name: Prime Devastator
prime_devastator.description: Heavily armored marine with deadly heavy weapons.

prime_heavy_devastator.name: Prime Heavy Devastator
prime_heavy_devastator.description: Heavily armored marine with deadly heavy weapons.

prime_heavy_devastator_sergeant.name: Prime Heavy Devastator Sergeant
prime_heavy_devastator_sergeant.description: Heavily armored marine leader with deadly heavy weapons.

psychic_grand_master.name: Psychic Grand Master
psychic_grand_master.description: A Master of psychic powers and martial combat, wielding heavy destroyer armor.

psychic_ancient.name: Psychic Ancient
psychic_ancient.description: A psychic marine carrying a sacred banner.

psychic_destroyer_ancient.name: Psychic Destroyer Ancient
psychic_destroyer_ancient.description: A psychic destroyer marine carrying a sacred banner.

psychic_marine.name: Psychic Marine
psychic_marine.description: Marine trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_marine_sergeant.name: Psychic Marine Sergeant
psychic_marine_sergeant.description: Marine leader trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

purge_marine.name: Purge Marine
purge_marine.description: Marine trained to hunt demons with heavy psychic weapons.

purge_sergeant.name: Purge Sergeant
purge_sergeant.description: Marine leader trained to hunt demons with heavy psychic weapons.

teleport_marine.name: Teleport Marine
teleport_marine.description: Marine trained to hunt demons with a teleporting backpack.

teleport_sergeant.name: Teleport Sergeant
teleport_sergeant.description: Marine leader trained to hunt demons with a teleporting backpack.

psychic_destroyer.name: Psychic Destroyer
psychic_destroyer.description: Marine in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_destroyer_sergeant.name: Psychic Destroyer Sergeant
psychic_destroyer_sergeant.description: Marine leader in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_paladin.name: Psychic Paladin
psychic_paladin.description: Tough marine in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_paladin_sergeant.name: Psychic Paladin Sergeant
psychic_paladin_sergeant.description: Tough marine leader in heavy armor trained to hunt demons and adept in psychic powers.

psychic_biker.name: Psychic Biker
psychic_biker.description: Psychic marine on a combat bikes.

psychic_biker_sergeant.name: Psychic Biker Sergeant
psychic_biker_sergeant.description: Psychic marine leader on a combat bike.

multi_scanner.name: Multi-Scanner
multi_scanner.description: Once per round, this unit or a friendly unit within 3“ may re-roll an Initiative test.

magnetic_grapple.name: Magnetic Grapple
magnetic_grapple.description: Units engaged in Melee with a model that has this weapon suffer -2 to Initiative tests when escaping combat for each weapon with this rule.

blinding_light.name: Blinding Light
blinding_light.description: Enemy models suffer -1 Strength when targeting this model with a Melee attack.

sweeping.name: Sweeping
sweeping.description: Strength rolls of 1 or 2 with this weapon cause 2 hits instead of 1.

legend_charge.name: Charge Leader
legend_charge.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 3" gain +3" Movement on any _Charge_ actions.

legend_hammer.name: Righteousness
legend_hammer.description: On a turn where this model charges, all Melee attacks gain +1 AP.

walker_transport.name: Walker Transport
walker_transport.description: This model may carry X _Walker_ models inside of it.

hunter_team.name: Hunter Team
hunter_team.description: At the start of the game, choose a unit category. Accuracy and Strength rolls of 1 or 2 gain +1 AP against units in that category.

rifle_tactics.name: Marine Ranged Tactics
rifle_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Accuracy tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

dread_walker_tactics.name: Dread Walker Tactics
dread_walker_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ or _Dread Walker_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

melee_tactics.name: Melee Tactics
melee_tactics.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

melee_tactics_bike.name: Biker Melee Tactics
melee_tactics_bike.description: When this unit is activated, choose up to X friendly _Infantry_ or _Biker_ units within 6". Those units may re-roll failed Strength tests of 9+ until the end of the round.

expert_marksman.name: Expert Marksman
expert_marksman.description: This model and friendly _Infantry_ units within 3" gain +1 to hit with shooting attacks.

grappling_hooks.name: Grappling Hooks
grappling_hooks.description: This model may ignore vertical movement distances when moving.

ancient_armor.name: Ancient Armor
ancient_armor.description: This model may re-roll 1 failed Save roll.

legend_remembrance.name: Armor of Remembrance
legend_remembrance.description: When this model is hit by an attack, roll a D10. On a 3 or less, that attack is prevented.

legend_shard.name: Demonic Shard
legend_shard.description: This model increases all power charge values by 1.

warding_staff.name: Warding
warding_staff.description: Enemy units suffer -1 to all Power(x) test while within 12" of this model.

hidden_relics.flavor: Ancient armour said to protect the wearer from significant harm.
A chainsword crafted to destroy even the toughest enemy infantry.
A trained marksman can have a very deadly effect.
A well-trained tactician in mobility warfare.
A trained fighter can dispatch even the toughest foes in deadly combat.

legend_gravity_field.name: Gravity Field
legend_gravity_field.flavor: This gravity field generator can be overcharged to bounce even the toughest attacks for a moment.

legend_remembrance.name: Armor of Remembrance
legend_remembrance.description: Upgrade one model with Armor of Remembrance.
legend_remembrance.flavor: This armor serves as a reminder to those who have fallen before them.

legend_shard.name: Demonic Shard
legend_shard.description: Upgrade one model with Demonic Shard.
legend_shard.flavor: This demonic crystal is imbued with psychic energy.

legend_staff.name: The Warding Staff
legend_staff.description: Replace one Leader model's Psychic Staff with The Warding Staff.
legend_staff.flavor: This staff has the power to absorb and stop psychic energy.

legend_righteousness.name: Righteousness
legend_righteousness.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Righteousness.
legend_righteousness.flavor: This model's purpose is pure and aim is righteous.

legend_charge.name: Charge Leader
legend_charge.description: Upgrade one Leader model with Charge Leader.
legend_charge.flavor: This model is known to be on the front line leading the first charge against the enemy.

the_black_blade.name: The Black Blade
the_black_blade.description: Replace one Leader model's Psychic Sword with The Black Blade.
the_black_blade.flavor: This blade is bound with the soul of a powerful demon, giving incredible strength.

strategies.name: Vigilance
strategies.description: Use when taking an Initiative test for a reaction. That unit is treated as having +2 Initiative for that test.
strategies.flavor: With countless battles experienced, these soldiers are trained to react to any situation.

strategies.name: Genetically Engineered
strategies.description: Use before taking Save rolls for an _Infantry_ or _Biker_ unit. It gets +1 Save.
strategies.flavor: With the best implants and engineering that can be found, it's easy to take a hit and keep standing.

strategies.name: Fearless
strategies.description: Use before activating a unit. That unit may immediately remove up to 2 Shock.
strategies.flavor: Marines are trained to stay strong even in the toughest fights.

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Target friendly unit within 12" may move up to 12" ignoring all models and terrain. This must end outside of 12" of any enemy units.

banishment.name: Banishment
banishment.description: Target enemy model within 12" takes 1 automatic hit with AP(7).

purge.name: Purge
purge.description: Target enemy unit within 12" take 8 automatic hits with AP 0.

empower.name: Empower
empower.description: Target friendly unit within 12“ gains +1 Strength and +1 Accuracy until the end of the turn.

snare.name: Snare
snare.description: Target enemy unit within 18" has -2" Movement until the end of the turn.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: Target friendly unit within 24“. Until the end of the round, roll a D10 each time that unit is hit. On a 2 or less, that hit is ignored.
